name: Analyze churn users Waze
skills: Data cleaning, Data analysis, Data visualization

description.overall: Wazeâ€™s free navigation app makes it easier for drivers around the world to get to where they want to go. In this project, I try to figure out why the application is having churn users and how to prevent them.
description.do: From the available data provided, I cleaned and transformed it with Pandas, Numpy, then I visualized data (seaborn, matplotlib) and use exploratory data analysis technique to understand the data more and find out patterns and differences of churn users and normal users.

description.overall: Analyzing user behavior to understand the differences between casual riders and annual members. This analysis aimed to inform the development of a new marketing strategy focused on converting casual riders into annual members.
description.do: From the available data provided by Google, I cleaned and transformed the data then analyzed and visualized data to find insights. I used Python and Tableau for this project.
